translations: [无脊椎]无脊椎动物（invertebrate 的复数）

sentences.sentence: A few hardy species wiped out many of the Mediterranean invertebrates.
sentences.translation: 少数顽强的物种消灭了许多地中海无脊椎动物。

sentences.sentence: Indeed, unaltered shells of marine invertebrates are known from deposits over 100 million years old.
sentences.translation: 事实上，海洋无脊椎动物不变的外壳是通过1亿年前的沉积物发现的。

sentences.sentence: Insects and even small invertebrates have been found preserved in the hardened resins of conifers and certain other trees.
sentences.translation: 人们在针叶树和某些其它树木的硬化树脂中发现了昆虫，甚至发现了小型无脊椎动物。
